_title_display: Contes et nouvelles en vers / de monsieur de La Fontaine.

description.value: Added etched t.p. by Romeyn de Hooghe. Ill. by de Hooghe.
Getty copy bound in 1 vol. in sprinkled calfskin. Spine tooled in gilt, including title. Edges sprinkled red. Now in box covered in red goatskin.
Signature of C. Morris. Printed label of Templeton Crocker. Pencilled inscription on back pastedown in manner of Leonard Baskin, giving bookseller (Luc. Goldschmidt), price code and date (1963).

identifier.volume: Getty Research Institute digitized version (Internet Archive)

title.value: Contes et nouvelles en vers / de monsieur de La Fontaine.
